ValidationRule.description: Required field Reference Number Assigned by NCA
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if( (ISPICKVAL(CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c, 'Follow-up report') || ISPICKVAL(CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c, 'Final report')) &&(CMPL123CME__NCA_Reference_Number__c = null || CMPL123CME__NCA_Reference_Number__c = ''),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field value cannot be balnk for this report type
